front.title: Network File System (NFS) Upper Layer Binding To RPC-Over-RDMA Version One

abstract.t: This document specifies Upper Layer Bindings of Network File System (NFS) protocol versions to RPC-over-RDMA Version One. Upper Layer Bindings are required in order to enable RPC-based protocols such as NFS to use Direct Data Placement on RPC-over-RDMA Version One. This document obsoletes RFC 5667.
